wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Evans (born 25 July 1992) is a Welsh professional rugby union footballer, he plays at scrum half for Scarlets in the Pro14.

response: * Jonathan Evans (politician) (born 1950), British lawyer and Conservative Party Member of Parliament
* Jonathan Evans (rugby union) (born 1992), Welsh rugby union player
* Jonathan Evans, Baron Evans of Weardale (born 1958), Director General of the British Security Service, from 2007 to 2013
